ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic tool crafting
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build a crafting workbench, that allows making basic handheld tools and simple mechanical parts.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Throwing weapons
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft several well balanced throwing weapons, that can perform effectively both in ranged and melee combat.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced melee weapons
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft improved melee weapons, better suited for fighting armored opponents.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Two-handed melee weapons
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft devastating two-handed equivalents of most weapons, that require significant physical training and conditioning to be wielded properly.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic crossbows
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft simple crossbows, that have superior armor penetration, but lower reload speed compared to shortbows.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Multishot crossbows
ResearchProjectDef.description: A relatively simple upgrade to crossbow firing mechanism allows production of models that can fire several shots in a row before reloading.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Heavy crossbows
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft long range siege crossbows - sophisticated mechanisms capable of launching heavy projectiles over extreme ranges and piercing through all but heaviest of armors.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Longbows
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft composite longbows for precision shooting over extreme distances and causing destruction with incendiary arrows.
